Source.Name: python-bottle
Source.Summary: Bottle is a fast, simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for Python
Source.Description: Bottle is a fast, simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for Python. It offers request dispatching (Routes) with url parameter support, templates, a built-in HTTP Server and adapters for many third party WSGI/HTTP-server and template engines - all in a single file and with no dependencies other than the Python Standard Library.

Package.Name: python-bottle
Package.Summary: Bottle is a fast, simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for Python
